trans-unit.source: Defines the interface that a channel must implement to both send and receive messages.
trans-unit.target: Definisce l'interfaccia che un canale deve implementare per inviare e ricevere messaggi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexChannel> interface is the union of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel> interfaces.
trans-unit.target: L'interfaccia <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexChannel> è l'unione delle interfacce <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel> e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexChannel> interface does not mandate any correlation between the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel> when implemented.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementata, l'interfaccia <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexChannel> non implica nessuna correlazione tra <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel> e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel>.

trans-unit.source: This means, in particular, that the contract does not mandate that the sender of messages that are received through the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel> is equal to the recipient of messages sent through the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel>.
trans-unit.target: Ciò significa, in particolare, che il contratto non implica che il mittente dei messaggi ricevuti tramite <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel> sia uguale al destinatario dei messaggi inviati tramite <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel>.
